Html:
Hello

I am using Wsus Package Publisher form the server where Wsus 3.0 SP2 is installed. I installed update KB2938066 to server and after that Wsus Package Publisher started giving "server version is different from console version" errors.
When i open the WPP App and went to Help->About there i see those Versions:

Server version 3.2.7600.274
Console version 3.2.7600.262

It looks like i cant get the console updated, i did install the patch in the same server where i use WPP from.
Any ideas how to fix this?
Hi, send me a mail at package.publisher@free.fr , I will send you a fix version of WPP.
Please download WPP release v1.3.1407.11 which fix this issue.

Problem solved.

Thank you very much.

ATUC2 wrote:
Server version 3.2.7600.274
Console version 3.2.7600.262
Is WSUS and WPP running on the same machine?
